Package Controller

Class InventoryController

java.lang.Object
Controller.InventoryController
public class InventoryController extends Object
InventoryController is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView, InventoryView, DisplayMedicalInventoryView ManageMedicalInventoryView and ManagReplenishmentRequestView and the model class - Admin, InventoryList and Medicine.

It can view/add/update/remove medical inventory items and get/approve/reject replenishment requsts

Since:
2024-11-17

  • Constructor Details

    • InventoryController

      public InventoryController()

  • Method Details

    • addMedicalInventory

      public static void addMedicalInventory(String medicineId, String medicineName, float medicinePrice, String medicineDescription, int medicineStock, int medicineLowStock)
      Adds a new medicine to the medical inventory and persists the data to the repository. Creates a new InventoryList item for the provided medicine details and updates the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medicineId - The unique identifier for the medicine.
      medicineName - The name of the medicine.
      medicinePrice - The price of the medicine.
      medicineDescription - A brief description of the medicine.
      medicineStock - The current stock level of the medicine.
      medicineLowStock - The low stock level alert threshold for the medi cine.

    • removeMedicalInventoryItem

      public static boolean removeMedicalInventoryItem(String medicineId)
      Removes a medical inventory item by its medicine ID. Prompts the user for confirmation before removal and persists the changes to the repository.
      Parameters:
      medicineId - The unique identifier of the medicine to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • searchMedicalInventoryById

      public static InventoryList searchMedicalInventoryById(String medicineId)
      Searches for a medical inventory item by its medicine ID.
      Parameters:
      medicineId - The unique identifier of the medicine to search for.
      Returns:
      The InventoryList item associated with the provided medicine ID, or null if not found.

    • updateMedicalInventoryStockLevel

      public static boolean updateMedicalInventoryStockLevel(String medicineId, int stockLevel)
      Updates the stock level of a specific medical inventory item. Persists the updated inventory to the repository.
      Parameters:
      medicineId - The unique identifier of the medicine to update.
      stockLevel - The new stock level for the medicine.
      Returns:
      true if the stock level was successfully updated, false if the medicine ID was not found.

    • updateMedicalInventoryLowStockAlert

      public static boolean updateMedicalInventoryLowStockAlert(String medicineId, int lowStockLevelAlert)
      Updates the low stock level alert for a specific medical inventory item. Persists the changes to the repository.
      Parameters:
      medicineId - The unique identifier of the medicine to update.
      lowStockLevelAlert - The new low stock alert level for the medicine.
      Returns:
      true if the alert level was successfully updated, false if the medicine ID was not found.

    • findAllReplenishmentRequests

      public static String findAllReplenishmentRequests()
      Retrieves all replenishment requests grouped by their status (Pending, Approved, Rejected).
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing all replenishment requests.

    • approveReplenishmentRequest

      public static boolean approveReplenishmentRequest(String requestId)
      Approves a replenishment request and updates the stock level of the associated inventory item. This method will deny approval if the request has already been approved or rejected.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The unique identifier of the replenishment request to approve.
      Returns:
      true if the request was successfully approved, false otherwise.

    • rejectReplenishmentRequest

      public static void rejectReplenishmentRequest(String requestId)
      Rejects a replenishment request by updating its status to REJECTED. This method will deny rejection if the request has already been approved or rejected.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The unique identifier of the replenishment request to reject.

    • getReplenishmentRequestById

      public static ReplenishmentRequest getReplenishmentRequestById(String requestId)
      Retrieves a specific replenishment request by its request ID.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The unique identifier of the replenishment request to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The ReplenishmentRequest associated with the provided request ID, or null if not found.

    • checkAllInventory

      public static String checkAllInventory(int all)
      Checks all inventory items and retrieves details of items. Includes an option to filter items based on their stock status.
      Parameters:
      all - 1 to list all items, 0 to list only items with low stock levels.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the inventory details.

    • getInventoryRecord

      public static String getInventoryRecord()
      Retrieves a detailed record of all medical inventory items.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the details of all inventory items, or "No inventory records found" if empty.
